replies.msg:
你所謂個source係篇記者鳩up ge故事

呢到就真係伊巴自己訪問source喇

ibra:“I think Messi is one of a kind. What he’s doing, I don’t know if we will see another player do the things that he does,” Ibrahimovic told ESPN. “I had the luck to see him every day and I saw what he was doing everyday. Like I said before, it’s like playing PlayStation: You give the ball to the guy and you start to go through every player and that’s who Messi is.”
https://www.foxsports.com/soccer/story/zlatan-ibrahimovic-lionel-messi-cristiano-ronaldo-debate-123016

Ibra: "Messi was competing with Florentino Pérez, not Cristiano"https://en.as.com/en/2018/12/10/football/1544436707_548519.html

Zlatan Ibrahimovic blasts Ronaldo for challenging Messi to play in Italy
http://dailypost.ng/2019/01/14/zlatan-ibrahimovic-blasts-ronaldo-challenging-messi-play-italy/

在2015年的金球獎投票中，伊巴選出的三人依次為美斯、蘇亞雷斯、尼馬，由此可見巴薩的攻擊線已經完全征服伊巴。而《每日體育報》還指出，這已經不是伊布第一次把票投給美斯，自從2009年擔任瑞典國家隊隊長後，伊巴在2009、2010、2011、2012、2013、2014、 2015這七年的金球獎投票中全部都把美斯放在第一的位置。
